entity.name: Fyra Labs
entity.description: A startup producing libre software with the goal of producing tools for anyone to change their world. Our primary focus is on the end-user Linux ecosystem, building up to a Linux system that works better for the user than existing options, and that anyone can use.

projects.name: Terra
projects.description: A community package repository for Fedora based distributions, providing access to essential software not in Fedora, and making it easier for developers to reach the Fedora ecosystem.
